title: Malediction ward (or)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The malediction ward (or) is a malediction ward with a ward upgrade kit attached to it. The kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the ward. It costs 3,737,245 for both the parts to make the malediction ward (or).

The malediction ward (or) is a malediction ward with a ward upgrade kit attached to it. The kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the ward. It costs 3,737,245 for both the parts to make the malediction ward (or).

While the ward is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be reverted anytime, returning the malediction ward. However, the kit will not be returned.

If a player dies with the ward and it is not one of the player's protected items, the ward will revert to its default appearance, and players must use another ward upgrade kit to enhance its appearance again.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 September 2015
(update)

A small change was made due to a problem caused by the model's polygon count.

20 August 2015
(update)

The Odium ward (or) and Malediction ward (or) have been cleaned up graphically.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Concept art of the reworked wards by Mod Alfred, which later became cosmetic upgrades.

  • Models for the reworked malediction wards. The middle was chosen as item's equipped model.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The model for this item was originally polled as a graphical update for the malediction ward in Content Poll #22. It gained 74.4% yes votes, 0.6% short of the passing threshold required. The model was then polled as a cosmetic upgrade kit in the Old School Bounty Hunter Rewards 2 poll, and passed by 77.7%.

[[File:Malediction ward (or) detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''malediction ward (or)''' is a [[malediction ward]] with a [[ward upgrade kit]] attached to it. The kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the ward. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Malediction ward}}+{{GEP|Ward upgrade kit}}}} for both the parts to make the malediction ward (or).

While the ward is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be reverted anytime, returning the malediction ward. However, the kit '''will not''' be returned.

If a player dies with the ward and it is not one of the player's protected items, the ward will revert to its default appearance, and players must use another ward upgrade kit to enhance its appearance again.
